# Data structures in R

- Vectors
- Matrices
- Data frames
- Lists
- Functions

---
class: chapter-slide

# Vectors

---

# Creating a vector

## Using the assignment operator

For one value

```{r}
my_vector <- 10
my_vector <- "a"
```

---
## Using the combine function

For two or more values

```{r}
my_vector <- c(1,10,25,30)
my_vector

my_vector <- c("a","b","c")
my_vector
```

---
## Using the seq() function

```{r}
my_vector <- seq(1:10)
my_vector

my_vector <- seq(from = 0, to = 10, by = 2)
my_vector
```

---
# Vector features

- Vectors have only one dimension (length)

```{r}
my_vector <- c(1,2,3,4)
length(my_vector)
```

---
- All vector components must be the same type

    - Numeric
    - Integer
    - Double
    - Character
    - Factor
    - Logical

---

- Numeric
```{r}
x_num <- c(1, 2, 3)
class(x_num)
```
--

- Integer
```{r}
x_int <- c(1L, 2L, 3L)
class(x_int)
```
---

- Double
```{r}
x_dbl <- c(1, 2.5, 3.1)
typeof(x_dbl)
```
--

- Character

```{r}
x_chr <- c("a", "b", "c")
class(x_chr)
```
---

- Factor
```{r}
x_fct <- factor("a","b","c")
class(x_fct)
```
--

- Logical
```{r}
x_log <- c(TRUE, FALSE, TRUE)
class(x_log)
```

---

- R finds a way to unify data type when there is more than one per vector

```{r}
x <- c(1, "a", TRUE)
x
class(x)
```

---
# Missing values

- NA

```{r}
x <- c(1, "a", TRUE, NA)
x
```

- NaN

```{r,warning=FALSE}
x <- c(10, -1, NA)
log(x)
```

# How to access vector elements?

---
## Using integer as index

Vector index in R starts from 1

```{r}
x <- c(1,2,3,4,5)
x

x[3] # Extract the third element
```

---
```{r}
x <- c(1,2,3,4,5)

# Extract index from 3 to 5
x[3:5]
```

--
```{r}
x <- c("a","b","c","d","e")

# Extract index 2 and 5
x[c(2,5)] 
```
---

## Using the name as index

```{r}
x <- c(1,3,10)
names(x)
```
--

```{r}
x <- c("first"= 1,"second"=3,"third"=10)
x
names(x)
```

---

```{r}
x <- c(1,3,10)

names(x) <- c("first", "second", "third")
x
```

--
```{r}
x["second"]
x[c("first","third")]
```

---

## Using logical evaluation as index

```{r}

x <- seq(1:10)
x

x < 5

x[x < 5]
```

---

```{r}

x <- c("a","a","b","c","c","c")

x == "c"

x[x == "c"]
```
